#Text=UEFA Euro 2016 , day 3 : Turkey-Croatia , Poland-Northern Ireland , Germany-Ukraine
#Text=Wednesday , June 15 , 2016
#Text=File photo of Arkadiusz Milik whose goal helped Poland enjoy their first victory in UEFA Euro turnamentImage : Damian Kosciesza .
#Text=On Sunday , day three of UEFA Euro 2016 , Turkey lost to Croatia 0 – 1 ; Poland defeated Northern Ireland 1 – 0 ; and world champions Germany defeated Ukraine 2 – 0 .
#Text=Group D — Turkey 0 – 1 Croatia
#Text=In the first match of the day , captain Arda Turan led Turkey against Croatia , facing his FC Barcelona teammate Ivan Rakitić .
#Text=Cenk Tosun of Turkey was the first player to be shown a yellow card in the 31st minute .
#Text=Almost ten minutes later , Luka Modrić scored from a volley , putting Croatia in front .
#Text=In the second half , Turkish player Hakan Balta was booked in the 48th minute .
#Text=In the 69th minute , Cenk Tosun was replaced by Emre Mor , making Mor the youngest Turk to feature in a UEFA Euro tournament .
#Text=Ivan Strinić was booked in the 80th minute and was the only Croatian player to be shown a yellow card in the match .
#Text=Just before the final whistle , Volkan Şen was shown a yellow card .
#Text=Croatia collected three points in Parc des Prince stadium .
#Text=Group C — Poland 1 – 0 Northern Ireland
#Text=Bayern Munich striker Robert Lewandowski led the Poles to a 1 – 0 victory over Northern Ireland as Arek Milik scored the only goal of the match in the 51st minute .
#Text=Three players were booked in the entire match .
#Text=Bartosz Kapustka and Łukasz Piszczek of Poland were booked in the 65th and 89th minutes respectively .
#Text=Craig Cathcart from Northern Ireland received a yellow card in the 69th minute .
#Text=Poland won the match with stronger ball possession and 88 % passing accuracy .
#Text=This was Poland 's first victory in a Euro tournament .
#Text=After the match , Milik said , " I finally did my job[ ... ]
